entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 9:23 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
